Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 80th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1982...
Injured on 6/9/1982 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/12/1985 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Cincinnati on 7/31/1987 (Going to CIN: SS E. Yelding, RF B. Distefano. Going to NYM: CF A. Dawson)...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/15/1987, off Kurt Kepshire (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/10/1988, off Joe Johnson (STL)...
